translations: v．用力拉，猛拉：用力地把某物拉起或移动。
· He was hoicking his suitcase up the stairs.
他正在用力把行李箱拖上楼梯。

sentences.sentence: Extracting shale gas is more disruptive than hoicking other hydrocarbons out of the ground-far more Wells must be sunk than are needed to produce the same quantity of conventional gas.
sentences.translation: 提取页岩气比从地面抽取其他碳氢化合物更具破坏性——比起生产同等的常规天然气需要下沉更多的勘探井。
